types:type.name: users-input-payload-format

%dw 2.0
type users_input_payload_format = Array<{| user_id: String, first_name: String, last_name: String, email: String, active: String, created: String, action_bit: String, export_bit: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"user_id\\\":\\\"AA84YDG\\\",\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"Joshua\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"White\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"joshua-white@yopmail.com\\\",\\\"active\\\":\\\"0\\\",\\\"created\\\":\\\"2022-09-09 16:56:11\\\",\\\"action_bit\\\":\\\"0\\\",\\\"export_bit\\\":\\\"0\\\"},{\\\"user_id\\\":\\\"AU40VVY\\\",\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"Kenneth\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"Davis\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"kenneth-davis@yopmail.com\\\",\\\"active\\\":\\\"0\\\",\\\"created\\\":\\\"2022-09-09 16:56:06\\\",\\\"action_bit\\\":\\\"0\\\",\\\"export_bit\\\":\\\"0\\\"}]"}

Avenue\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Wilsonville\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"Arizona\\\",\\\"zipcode\\\":\\\"253714\\\",\\\"created\\\":\\\"2022-09-08 11:20:22\\\",\\\"action_bit\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"export_bit\\\":\\\"0\\\"},{\\\"user_id\\\":\\\"YU81MUY\\\",\\\"address_id\\\":\\\"AA429EPCM\\\",\\\"street\\\":\\\"928-3313 Vel Av.\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Chelsea\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"Montana\\\",\\\"zipcode\\\":\\\"765138\\\",\\\"created\\\":\\\"2022-09-08 11:20:22\\\",\\\"action_bit\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"export_bit\\\":\\\"0\\\"}]"}
